𓈎 𓃀 𓃀 (adj. and v.) cool, cold, cooling (of remedy), calm, quiet, be purified, take one's ease
𓈎 𓃀 𓃀 qur.ba > קֹר qorbar 𓈎 𓃀 𓃀 qu.bar > pure 𓈎 𓃀 𓃀 qubārid duplication=>long vowel
𓈎 𓃀 𓃀 quᵐbard برودة buruda بَارِد bārid رد bard bròst > frost 𓈎 𓃀 qvr 𐍆𐍂𐌹𐌿𐍃 gefrier… 𓈎 𓃀 𓃀 qubārid > quiet kylmä "cold" <> calm 𓈎 𓃀 𓃀 qubārid > purified ⇔ pour 𓎿 𓏂
𓈎 𓃀 𓃀 quorbid > ցուրտ cʿurt > хо́лад cold 𓈎 𓃀 𓃀 quorbid > ցուրտ cʿurt > κρύος krúos ≈ ϩⲣⲟϣ ḫroš "cold" krostaññe κρύο krýo cryo- 추위 chuwi

𒂁 𒀀𒇷𒁀 dug a-gub2-ba aguba "a cultic vessel for water" #agubbû a aqua cup

cold @ 𒆳 kar(st) 𓐍 𓆼 𓋴 𓏏 𓈉 kar קַר 𒆳 kurde kürᵒˢ κρύος krýos kard > सर्द sard > शीत śīt студе́н studén శీతల śītala sed kard > kalt > cold káw̄i' kard > kalt > kältse > 𒈻 #kuşu kuşşu ቀዝቃዛ ḳäzḳaza
